sen.e: He took the important posts such as Omi no kuni Gon no suke (provincial vice governor of Omi Province), Kogo no miya Gon no suke (provincial assistant master of the Empress's household), Kurodo no to (head chamberlain), Bingo no kuni Gon no kami (provincial governor of Bingo Province), and in 1155 he was ranked Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) as a reward of the service of Kokushi (provincial governor) at Onie no Matsuri (the grand festival cerebrated firstly after the enthronement ceremony).
